title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 15.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 15.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purpose of this Part: (a) Approved policy means an insurance policy approved by the Superintendent of Insurance as meeting the requirements of Insurance Law, section 3101 and of this Part. (b) Replacement policy means an insurance policy issued upon termination of an approved policy, as provided in section
15.5
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
15.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
